data.name: DevOps Project
data.description: üöÄThis project involved setting up a CI/CD pipeline for a Spring Boot and Angular application, automating the build, test, and deployment processes. Using Docker for containerization and Jenkins for pipeline automation, seamless integration and delivery were ensured. The project also included quality checks with Maven and SonarQube, and real-time monitoring with Prometheus and Grafana. This demonstrates skills in DevOps and automating software delivery.‚ö° Skills: Spring Boot,Angular, Docker, Vagrant, Jenkins, Maven, SonarQube, Mockito, Jacoco, Nexus, Prometheus, Grafana
